Code Implementierung

Blockchain Smart Contract


pragma solidity ^0.8.0;

contract DigitalTwin {
    mapping(address => bool) public authorizedUsers;
    
    event TwinCreated(address indexed creator, uint256 twinId);
    
    function createDigitalTwin(bytes32 _hash) external {
        require(authorizedUsers[msg.sender], "Unauthorized");
        // Implementation logic...
    }
}

API

Technical Documentation

GET /api/digital-twins/{id}

Retrieve digital twin information and metadata

POST /api/digital-twins/create

Create new digital twin with blockchain binding

PUT /api/digital-twins/{id}/verify

Verify digital twin authenticity and signatures
